section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
The Leading Universal Think Tank. Planet Without Frontiers® Institution envision to be the Universal Platform for open free dialog, multidisciplinary research, vibrant initiatives and sustainable development policy discourse. Help planet-humanity for the constructive transition towards sustainable and social just development. 
 
·        Positive source of institutional research expertise and advisory services for the public-private sector, and non-governmental sustainable initiatives. 
 
·        Conduct policy-oriented research on sustainable development from a broad trans-disciplinary perspective. 
 
·        Provide research supported policy advice on matters relating to the institutional global scope. 
 
·        Facilitate, initiate, establish and participate in global positive collaborative activities for a fair just world for all. 
 
·        Contribute in strengthening the social and physical resources for research on global issues.
